pkgmetadata.longdescription: Phase I Shewhart X-Bar Chart // The purpose of 'PH1XBAR' is to build a Phase I Shewhart control chart for the basic Shewhart, the variance components and the ARMA models in R for subgrouped and individual data. More details can be found: Yao and Chakraborti (2020) doi: 10.1002/qre.2793, Yao and Chakraborti (2021) doi: 10.1080/08982112.2021.1878220, and Yao et al. (2023) doi: 10.1080/00224065.2022.2139783.
